name: Hell Ninja
description:
In this Ninja fighting game, you will transform into a scary ninja. Your mission is to protect your homeland and sneak into enemy areas to assassinate and destroy them.

Features of Hell Ninja:
-Each Ninja character with different skills such as plenty of moves, and lightning-fast darts, these great skills will help the ninja to face, and overcome all dangers and challenges to complete the mission.

-In the journey of Fight, you can collect more resources and gold from the enemy to increase combat power.

-- Beautiful graphics, wonderful fighting music, and easy to play and control, It will be an addictive game for you.

- There are 4 maps and 30+ levels, also it has many interesting challenges in the maps

Play Hell Ninja games right now, we believe that the ninja games will bring you a different experience
